description: This file defines the PaymentRepository interface, extending JpaRepository for CRUD operations on Payment entities, and includes custom query methods for retrieving payments by invoice and status.

classes.name: PaymentRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Payment entity, providing database access methods.

methods.name: findByInvoice
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Payment objects associated with the specified invoice.

methods.name: findByInvoiceAndStatus
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Payment objects associated with the specified invoice and having the specified payment status.
